meaningMnemonic: When you are able to <kanji>guarantee</kanji> against <kanji>risk</kanji>, it's probably because you bought some good <vocabulary>insurance</vocabulary>! What do you use? The gecko 保険?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
